# Biography

I am an Associate Professor at the School of Psychology, Massey University, Auckland, New Zealand. My research interests include the beliefs in conspiracy theories, misinformation, and meta-psychology.

## Education

-   PhD (Psychology), 2016, Massey University
-   Master of Arts (Psychology), 2010, Massey University
-   Graduate Diploma in Arts (Psychology), 2006, Massey University
-   Bachelor of Business Studies (Finance), 2005, Massey University
